005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModelNodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IRootAssemblyNodeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * An {@link IPathFormatter} that produces a Metapath expression for the path to
023 * a given {@link INodeItem}.
024 */
025public class MetapathFormatter implements IPathFormatter {
026
027  @Override
028  public @NonNull String formatMetaschema(IModuleNodeItem metaschema) {
029    // this will result in a slash being generated using the join in the format
030    // method
031    return "";
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  public String formatDocument(IDocumentNodeItem document) {
036    // this will result in a slash being generated using the join in the format
037    // method
038    return "";
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public String formatRootAssembly(IRootAssemblyNodeItem root) {
043    return ObjectUtils.notNull(root.getQName().getLocalPart());
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public String formatAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem assembly) {
048    // TODO: does it make sense to use this for an intermediate that has no parent?
049    return formatModelPathSegment(assembly);
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public String formatAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem assembly) {
054    // TODO: does it make sense to use this for an intermediate that has no parent?
055    return formatModelPathSegment(assembly);
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public String formatField(IFieldNodeItem field) {
060    return formatModelPathSegment(field);
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  public String formatFlag(IFlagNodeItem flag) {
065    return "@" + flag.getQName();
066  }
067
068  @SuppressWarnings("null")
069  @NonNull
070  private static String formatModelPathSegment(@NonNull IModelNodeItem<?, ?> item) {
071    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(item.getQName().getLocalPart())
072        .append('[')
073        .append(item.getPosition())
074        .append(']');
075    return builder.toString();
076  }
077}
